##When it comes to disease, everyone in town is different

Micro Signal thelivings

The function introduction, reconstructs our life with the narrative beauty.

"By that time, he had already crossed the bridge and walked a long way on the road to the grave. How could he still hear the human blow? "

Photo: still from four springs

Foreword

From the first case of COVID-19 pneumonia in Wuhan on December 8,2019, to the full outbreak on January 20,2020, the development of the situation is gripping everyone's heart.
It was a war that broke out at the beginning of the new year around every ordinary, ordinary Chinese.
This is our war, and we discuss it eagerly, analyze it carefully, deplore the loss of life in disaster, be moved by the audacity of the healer, and be Fear Is the Key by all human error, for all the little things we can do for them.
The Sea of life, let us hold hands in troubled times, and walk and cherish.
Netease's "the new pneumonia: Our War" feature tells the story of how we meet the epidemic every single day.

New Crown Pneumonia our war has been serialized 04

Closed teahouses, smashed Mahjong tables

My hometown is in a small village in the plain of western Sichuan, about 50 kilometers from Chengdu.
My Grandmother, who has three children, lives in the county seat, and her three grandchildren live further afield, in big cities like Beijing and Shanghai that are out of her reach. My grandmother used to say, "I gave birth to you and raised you, but you all grew up and flew away like birds. " On New Year's Eve, all three of US had to rush back to the countryside for the "Year of the regiments" , is What Grandma looks forward to all year round.
The day I returned to my grandmother's house, the epidemic had not yet aroused such great concern. The Winter Sun was lazily spreading on the earth. The fields were green. Several early-maturing rape plants were sprouting yellow flowers. Everything seemed calm and stable, spring is in the air.
GRANDMA'S YARD has a row of pomelo trees, the whole yard is the scent of trees, leaves, the wind blowing, the leaves of the green light flying fold, like a green water flashing in the surging. A few years ago, my grandmother raised a variety of animals, pigs, chickens, ducks, geese, these years to raise a little chicken to eat leftovers, there is a brown dog, named Lao Huang. Old Yellow Gentle, always silently looking at grandma, eyes like something to say, very loved. Mother said, I bought milk and cookies for her grandmother, her grandmother was reluctant to eat, but sometimes will be used to feed old yellow.
Third Aunt is sitting in the yard and grandmother Sun, together to clean leeks. The third aunt sighed and said that she thought the third uncle was dying, that is, the New Year these days. Suddenly, she remembered an important matter, tone hurried up: "eight teams of Ma Fung-kwok, you do not remember? The 10th day of the 1st Lunar Month, on the Ridge fell a fall, sent to the hospital and died. "
Like a pebble rippling across the yard, grandma was surprised. "really? " She said. "I saw him last month at the market. "
Third Aunt soon released: "people are old, like this, like porcelain bowl, one touch broken. But such a death is better than in bed sick for many years, do not drag down their children and grandchildren, also avoid suffering. "
GRANDMA SMILED: "If one day you go to bed, you will not think so, anyway, people still want to live. "
News of the pneumonia outbreak began to spread rapidly on the 22nd. Although Sichuan is some distance away from the center of the epidemic, the Spring Festival homecoming has already begun. Knowing that several of my friends working in Wuhan have returned to Sichuan, I immediately became nervous and advised my family to cancel the year of the Youth League this year. But the elders did not think so, that I "in the big city for a long time, see less strange, too pity life" , New Year's Eve morning, grandma in order to entertain their children and grandchildren, but also in the yard to kill a domesticated chicken.
On the first day of the Lunar New Year, I repeated the news about the epidemic in my family's wechat group. The elders still ignored it and clamored to get together to play Mahjong, especially my uncle.
When my uncle was young, he was a well-known gambler in the village. He was well-versed in all aspects of mah-jongg, fighting against landlords, frying gold flowers, running fast and playing long cards. In the past 10 years, my uncle and their gambling friends have left the countryside and moved to the county town to work and live. Playing Mahjong at home during the Spring Festival has become the main way for them to renew their friendship, more and "face" is closely related: Who can sit down leisurely in the village head Mahjong Hall, the greater the number of Mahjong, who will be able to prove that he now "live well. ". A group of middle aged men in their 40s and 50s, unskilled, generally engaged in hard work in the county seat -- as men delivered deliveries and decorated, as beautiful women, younger women sold clothes, after 45, you have to wait tables. They may usually live frugally, a dollar broken into two fifty cents, if the New Year in the face of old friends in the neighborhood, it is a rare happy time of the year.
My cousin was so angry that she came to me for advice. "My father had been itching to go out for a month, and now he wouldn't let him go out. He was as anxious as a monkey. I tried to tell him, and he said, after the 2008 Sichuan earthquake, the aftershocks, the mah-jongg we weren't afraid of back then, is it worse than an earthquake, i still remember, at that time, the villagers will stand on their heads next to the Mahjong table a beer bottle, as long as the bottle fell, they immediately ran out of the teahouse, vibration finished, then go back to play.
I co-cousin, cousin said, the elders are not serious. Finally, we had to put out a threat in the group that if they insisted on going out to play Mahjong, the three of US would move to a hotel in the county and not go home for the New Year next year.
The elders were so angry that they did not want to fight with me openly in the group. "Well, these three children of our family have read some books, and now they are bullying us. "
Unexpectedly, the next day, the atmosphere suddenly tense. The city government issued a notice: All teahouses, teahouses and other places where people gather are temporarily closed. It was from this moment that the people back home realized the seriousness of the problem. The elders thought it was incredible. After all, playing Mahjong in a teahouse has become their most familiar way of life and spiritual sustenance, the impact of closing a teahouse is more real than the agonies of our generation -- something is really wrong.
"Oh ho, not playing Mahjong is just like sitting in jail! " My uncle was still pretending to be happy in the group, but no one continued his joke, and everyone began to remind each other "don't move around each other, stay at home is the safest" , there was a faint sense of uneasiness in the crowd.
The government soon dispatched a group of on-duty police to patrol and search everywhere. They caught people who had gathered to play mah-jongg, rushed in directly and smashed the mah-jongg table with a hammer. Now everyone knew the government was serious. Everyone was shut down. There was hardly anyone on the road. Only the sparrows were still bouncing briskly from branch to branch and from wire to wire.
On January 28, the fourth day of the first lunar month, in the "real-time news of the new type of pneumonia epidemic in China" on the screen of the mobile phone, a series of "serious face" messages, such as the growing real-time epidemic situation, medical relief, and material donations, etc. , a "Sichuan Mahjong Hall all closed, " The news, to the people outside Sichuan, it seems a little funny, but to uncle, they may have no choice.

A Bewitched of reconciliation, a funeral you can't go to

Early on the morning of the 28th, my grandmother woke us up, and my grandfather's brother, my great uncle, had died, as was to be expected, not from pneumonia, but from terminal liver cancer.
The grandmother repeatedly sighs: "You say, this he Lao San, sooner or later not late, but die at this time. ". Now the people of the village are afraid to go out, no one gives him a ceremony, no one mourns, no one gives him a ride, just quietly, like the wind blowing on the grass, silently left."
Grandfather a total of five brothers, after the family split, but all live in a production team, each other door to door, chicken and dog smell. When I was young, the Five sisters-in-law got together and made a big deal out of every little thing, or isolated and defeated their opponents. Today you're with me, tomorrow I'll poke behind your back, is nothing less than love and hate in a palace drama.
Among them, my grandmother and third aunt is a pair of enemies.
According to her grandmother, the first time she saw her third aunt Zhang Xiuqiong, "I think this woman is not a good thing. ". Her eyes were long and thin, and her eyes were like those of a Fox, a cunning, scheming, fangy creature, whose white face, or as the old saying goes, "green face" , was evidence of a grudge and a small mind.
In their more than half a century of "diplomatic history" , bilateral relations have been at times treacherous, shifting and Away from Her. During the Ice Age, my grandmother used to accuse my grandmother of scheming, as if she were a young woman working in a factory, she also often took advantage of people not paying attention to hide in the pants leg, belt, secretly take home, this became her in the grandmother's heart can not erase the file; when the contradiction became white-hot, the grandmother had put the misdeeds of the third aunt, the third aunt was very angry, she poured manure on her grandmother, who affectionately called her "sister Joan" during the warm-up period, and praised her good-looking and quick-talking in front of others, she even sent her grandchildren home with a special treat.
In the country sky, white clouds and white dogs, there seems to be a subtle attraction between the two women, who can neither separate nor embrace, but always in a tension of opposites and unity. They sometimes moved, sometimes hate, sometimes confide in each other's difficulties, sometimes gnash their teeth, want to kill each other. Even their men couldn't fathom the extent to which their complex relationship had developed, as grandfather would often wake up, found that my grandmother's mouth kind and lovely "Joan sister" turned back into a shameless "Zhang sell x" .
This kind of situation, the liver cancer that year obtained the complete reversal finally in Uncle San. Grandma took her mother to the hospital to see, Sanshugong abdomen has become swollen swollen, as if the whole weight of the body is concentrated in the abdomen, Sanshugong eye socket deep, dark face, the whole person short circle. She took her grandmother's hand and said, "second sister, I have thought of giving him no treatment, he died, I also die, lest he suffer, also wasted children's money. " Grandmother scolded her: "A lifetime of clever, how come at this time so confused. ". Two old ladies burst into tears together, became a pair of dependent sisters.
We all advised grandma, the epidemic is serious, at this time do not go to uncle three, if you want to send condolences, we can transfer to uncle three's son on the mobile phone. Grandma Hung Up, sweep the yard, go to the kitchen to see if the water is hot, said, "so big, no one to make a decision for her" , "you all stay at home, I still have to see.
The morning fog had not yet lifted, and there was a white frost in the fields outside my house, and in the silence there was a great hint. Grandma wrapped her nose and mouth in a scarf and went out the door.
An hour later, grandma came back. Uncle Three family has decided, "do nothing" , as soon as possible to his crematorium, he lives in the county, the field of children and grandchildren also take into account the overall situation, temporarily do not go home, wait for the end of the epidemic, give him a make-up white wine banquet.
But the grandmother feels that does not have the meaning: "Wait until that time, he has already crossed the bridge, walked on the dead-end road for a long time, the human blow blows to beat him how to still hear? "

Grandmother in the fields, the unharvestable vegetables

She is 78 years old, and unlike her children and grandchildren, she and her grandfather have been reluctant to leave the countryside. Her mother had taken her several times to live in the county town, but she found the enclosed apartment stifling, and, mindful of the deserted fields and the family dog, always left without saying goodbye after two days.
Not only did she find it hard to live in a building, she and her 82-year-old grandfather still work in the fields. My grandmother worked as a farmer all her life, and she suffered from many chronic diseases. She often suffered from pain around her waist and shoulders. My grandfather had a car accident a few years ago, and his brain congestion damaged some of his motor functions. Now his left hand is not very handy, but that didn't stop them from going to the fields.
Their children and grandchildren repeatedly persuade them not to go to the ground again, so old still working, let a person uncomfortable, heartache, each family a little money, completely can let them live comfortably. Of course, my siblings and I were also a bit of a lock -- as if we let outsiders see our grandparents farming at their age, thinking that our children and grandchildren don't want to be filial and mistreating the elderly. But for her grandparents, "going to the ground" was not just a way of making a living, it was also an unstoppable habit of life, and it was linked to their simple moral values: those who did not work were immoral.
My Grandmother had never read a book in her life. She couldn't even write her own name, but she occasionally said something that made me feel inferior to myself when I was a literature major. For example, she said: a person's life is written in his name, Grandfather's name "Daita" , so he can not leave the field all his life, to old, unable to walk, one day died, will eventually return to the field. She also said: Children and grandchildren are birds, can fly, but she and her grandfather is turnip Tassel, out of the field, will not live a few days.
When news of the outbreak broke, I would grab my phone and check the news every few minutes. The statistics of growth, the latest reports from the front, the news from the group kept exploding in my mind, sadness, worry, fear, anger and other negative emotions are mixed, I like suffering from anxiety disorder like fidgeting, talking to my family is often absent-minded.
From beginning to end, only grandma and GRANDPA did not panic, they as usual, let inertia lead them to the field every day, work silently, do not say a word, living in a self-enclosed silence. We advised them not to go out, they said, an Mu of field, only two or three people, so empty place, how can it be infected.
This year, grandma planted more than two mu of vegetables. Children's Food I have only seen in Sichuan before, now with the development of logistics has begun to "north. ". This kind of green sprouts, like pagoda, thick roots, surrounded by each other holding a emerald green bags, like a mother holding a child, it is also known as "Baoercai. ". The dish is sweet and bitter in taste, and is used for stewing meat in winter to reduce heat. It is harvest season at present.
The government bans recreational activities in confined spaces and calls for people to travel less, but does not restrict farming. On the 29th, Grandma went to the field early in the morning to peel the baby vegetables and wait for the vegetable seller, Xiao Zhou, to buy them in the afternoon. I also went to the field to help, stripped for half an hour, waist will not straighten up acid. Sitting in the office, I can not imagine, grandmother has to work like this most of the day, she is how to persevere.
The Sky had darkened and there was no sign of Zhou. Grandma's eyes again and again toward the direction of the village road, could not help but dial a small week's phone.
"A cheekbone, wait a minute, don't worry. " Xiao Zhou's voice sounded like a loud trumpet, impatient and flustered, "I'm closing a lot of houses today. I'll come over later. The roads will be closed from tomorrow, so I can't get through, so I'll have to rush to collect all I can today. "
"How can the road be closed? " My grandmother was so shocked that she was only half-finished with the vegetables in her field. If the vegetable seller didn't come for several days, the vegetables would grow old after the mature period and become hollow and inedible.
"The government is tightening its grip, and some roads will be blocked tomorrow, " said Zhou, who was too busy with business to elaborate and hung up in a few words.
Grandma stood in the yard worried, the twilight becoming more and more blurred with her body.
"It's strange that the TV only said to seal off the sick place, but why do we have to seal it up even if it's far away from here? "
I can't explain it to grandma. Now that the local authorities are facing a major enemy, they do not dare to neglect the issue of epidemic prevention, and increase the number of steps one by one. Once they reach the grass-roots level, they will tend to adopt the most strict strategy of ensuring 100 percent that nothing will happen. As for whether it will delay the farmers'harvest, there are no more elaborate management policies. I can only comfort grandmother, "it does not matter, son dish total also can not sell how much money" , if I lose some money out to compensate her.
But these words did not have any effect, grandma's eyes sparkle: "No, every time I took your money, I feel guilty. " She began to repeat, last year because of the rain did not have time to collect, a lot of rotten in the ground, this had forgotten the dull pain, and now surfaced in her heart.
I have some concerns that farmers are the most vulnerable and silent group in any policy fluctuation, and they often suffer losses without the means to speak out. If the traffic is interrupted for too long, it will be a lose-lose situation for both farmers and urban residents.
I asked my friend who stayed in Beijing how she was doing. She said everyone around her was a little upset. She went to the supermarket during the day. Other supplies were fine, but it was hard to get fresh vegetables, "The box of horses by my house was sold out after half an hour's opening today. "
Even at night, Cho didn't come.

Never-ending chatter, dispelling persistent rumors

"Look, look, this is the new rural demonstration area built in Rio do Sul after the earthquake. There are family members there, and the son-in-law is back from working in Wuhan! His family has been lying to everyone, his son-in-law still running around, playing Mahjong! Until today he had a seizure and the production team rushed to his house and started fighting!"
In the family wechat group, my cousin suddenly retweeted a message and a shaky video. In the video, about 30 or 40 people gathered in front of a small building in the countryside. Some were wearing masks strictly, some were showing their faces and shouting abuse, and some were standing outside, craning their necks to watch the scene, others beat on the family's doors and windows with long sticks. The crowd surged, and the men in front of them, agitated, tried to break in and reason with the people inside. Two policemen stood guard at the door to prevent violence. The man and the policeman are almost cheek to cheek, and at this particular moment they seem to be breathing air into each other's faces. In the background, there was a buzzing noise, a few dirty words vaguely audible, perhaps condemning the family as "son of a bitch. ".
In the past year, Douyin has become the most fashionable means of communication in the country and in the countryside. Once people in a dull life open a window of entertainment within reach, they become obsessed with it. Mother sometimes also said, shaking sound brush long, people will feel tired and empty, the mind is full of colorful fragments, but nothing. I advised my mother to read something like Chiung Yao, or romance novel, or the Chicken Soup for the Soul, when she was younger. Mother shook her head again, "who still reads now, can't keep up with the trend" .
Within a few days, a short video of the outbreak went viral in my family. The elders from one extreme to the other extreme, a few days ago Dailie, do not care, these days is listening to the wind and rain, add oil and vinegar. The short video, which was forwarded by my cousin, quickly became the focus of discussion.
"Is it true? Although it is in Sichuan dialect, Sichuan is so big that it seems that the house is not ours. " My cousin raised a question in the group as if she were a Golden Fox, but no one answered her words, elders have begun to have a nose to describe the eye, "the People's Hospital yesterday has died a person, is likely to be the family's son-in-law. ".
I had to send a live feed of the outbreak to the crowd, let us not spread rumors: "This dynamic is the national network, updated quickly, if yesterday's death, should have been officially announced, now we have no deaths in the whole prefecture-level city. "
"The government just doesn't want us to know, " my aunt said confidently.
In addition, drinking can kill the virus, eat raw pepper can kill the virus, pets can be infected with the virus, a certain community in the urban area of a group of infectious... are also the elders of the rumors. At the beginning, my cousin and I, cousin like firefighters around the fire, found a rumor to put out a, said later, all feel a little powerless. Elders seem to be bored at home, deliberately and we play cat and mouse game, rumor growth is always faster than the speed of our refutation.
"I just found out today that all the elders in our family are Su Daqiang. " My cousin complained in the small group of the three of us, "Come on, let them believe it. It's okay to drink more wine and salt water. "
A few hours later, my cousin reposted on the group the official wechat account of the city government, which issued a statement refuting rumors of mass beating, making it clear that the video that my cousin had just forwarded was not a local matter. To convince everyone, the official microeditor has created a contrast image -- a screen shot on the left, the building is white, the new rural demonstration area in Rio do Sul is on the right, the building is Reddish Brown, the image is embossed in bold red letters: "obviously not in the same place. ".
Through the screen, I can feel the full desire to survive.
"Don't panic, elders, " I said. "It's hard to tell the truth from the truth. You should read the official news or the reports from the authoritative media. " I hastened to give my cousin a lecture, but no one answered me.
Then my cousin posted a funny video clip about the epidemic in the group, with the exaggerated tone and the funny music and the sound of laughter at the end.

Eager to return to the city of the younger generation, the old people resettled

Early on the morning of the 30th, Zhou finally arrived with his tricycle full of dust and black marks on his mask.
"On the cheekbones, it's $1.40 a kilo today. "
"yesterday, it was $1.60. How come there are still two dimes missing today? You people, don't try to deceive us, old people. " Grandma said angrily.
Xiao Zhou shouted at the top of her voice, "I didn't cheat you, " he said. "Now people are in a panic. I don't know if I can sell it again. My superiors are also lowering the price. I'm also angry. " "Why don't you go and see if anyone else will take it? I'm the only one in the area who's still taking it. Make up your mind. I have to get my car out of the village by 9 o'clock. I'm afraid I won't be able to get out later. "
Grandma waved her hand and said, "$1.40 it is. ".
When the dishes were weighed, my mother heard that some roads had been blocked by Xiao Zhou. She felt a little flustered and worried that the road back to the county town would be impassable in the next two days. We decided to go back to the city immediately, I am more worried about the change, want to return to Beijing as soon as possible.
Grandma had not recovered from the shock of Zhou's price reduction, and when she heard that we were leaving, she looked at her mother with even more sadness. "Are you leaving now? " She took my hand again and said, "I won't see my granddaughter until next year. "
My mother's generation, the early years of life in the town, near the countryside, grandma go to market, walk can also go to town to see their children and grandchildren. It was the golden age of the village, when the market was crowded. Mother opened a wine shop in the town, their own sorghum wine, home production and sales, business is prosperous, father in the town middle school teaching, my family's life is quite moist. Later, "fewer and fewer people, the young people are going to the city, the people who stay, think to drink a brand of bottled wine to have noodles, business is getting worse and worse, sometimes half a day only to wait for a patron. ". Mother simply closed the liquor store, to the county to find another sales job, father's school was also too few students were merged, the work was transferred to the county near the city, we will buy a house in the county life.
There are no big words like "urbanization" or "aging" in a mother's mind, only the fragmentary images of real-life collisions and the dizziness and pain of rapid change around her. The pain was subtle, sometimes imperceptible, sometimes forgotten by her mother, sometimes sudden, in the dead of night when she could not sleep. She couldn't help but tell me over and over that the school where we used to live was now overgrown and deserted, that the shutters of her old wine shop were shuttered and dusty, and that there were hardly any young people in the countryside, all that was left was the old man who had moved on.
To my mother's great sorrow, one by one, these old people were taken away by incurable diseases. My grandfather's brothers died of stomach cancer, esophageal cancer, cerebral hemorrhage, and liver cancer, both as carriers of disease and as metaphors for it -- as if the Zang-fu were dying off. I comforted my mother: As life expectancy has increased, cancer has increased as a normal phenomenon, but also related to the lifestyle of older generations. My Mother did not believe me at all. She was enveloped in a kind of great grief, preferring to believe the fortune-teller's statement that so many people in the village were ill because of the poor pulse of the land, and that the place where the village lived was under the tail of a dragon who could not move, fIDGETY, so often bring disaster. The only way to do that is to move out as a group and build a new home.
But it is not easy for dozens of families to move collectively. Families with a little bit of means simply give up their home in order to live better and get rid of the shadow of superstition. They would rather rent a house than stay in the county seat. The pace of migration has been accelerated by the post-earthquake reconstruction in Wenchuan County, where the Glamour of the city is unquestionably greater and the countryside is inevitably Pale and silent.
Uncle died the second day, to the crematorium funeral car finally found, the past to a trip, two or three hundred dollars can be. Now special period, the driver is not willing to go out, at any rate, finally increased to 500 yuan, the driver would like to run a trip.
The car rumbled away, "He Lao San has been so stingy all his life that his own grandson can't afford to buy a candy Bar, " said his grandmother suddenly black comedy. "If he knew that he paid twice as much to go to the crematorium, he would have to tell his sister June to burn it at home. "
Finally, the grandmother also worried about the dishes in the field, carrying the basket on his back to the ground.
I followed her, the empty basket creaking on her shoulder as if singing briskly. The panic in my heart faded away, and there was a wonderful wonder: She did not seem to be sad about the death of her uncle, and she was not afraid of the epidemic outside, as if she did not think that human life was worth more than the acres of food in front of her. But I know my grandmother is not a cold-hearted person, who is in trouble in the village, she is willing to help, this in the end how to explain?
When I was a child, whenever I mentioned the word "death" , my grandmother was in a state of shock and was in a hurry to "fie" , lest I should get my hands on something inauspicious. However, around the time of my return to Tuannian, my grandmother even talked about death so calmly from time to time, it's like talking about eating or going to the ground. I'm still a little confused by the emotion.
Before my mother and I returned to the city, my grandmother hurriedly packed me three catties of vegetables, two bags of pickled turnips, and a jar of Spicy fermented bean curd. She blushed. "You gave grandma a red envelope, but grandma didn't have anything nice to give you. "
Grandma is haunted by the shame of not being able to give her children and grandchildren a better life. She doesn't know, and I'm ashamed. I'm a traitor who ran away from the land that gave me birth. Sitting in the car on my way back to the county seat, with my grandmother's vegetables, dried turnips and fermented bean curd in my arms, I felt safe and unafraid, even though I was about to return to Beijing and face the unknown in that huge, chaotic city.
Outside the window, the ground had been torn by the earthquake, but now the wound had healed. Catastrophe always happens, in the face of disaster, people are always easy to be collectivism, large, stress emotions, but disaster will always have a time in the past, and life is long, specific, subtle. Perhaps the more we love concrete things on earth, the more courage we have in the face of disaster.
Editor | Zhibo Xu

Foreword

From the first case of COVID-19 pneumonia in Wuhan on December 8,2019, to the full outbreak on January 20,2020, the development of the situation is gripping everyone's heart.
It was a war that broke out at the beginning of the new year around every ordinary, ordinary Chinese.
This is our war, and we discuss it eagerly, analyze it carefully, deplore the loss of life in disaster, be moved by the audacity of the healer, and be Fear Is the Key by all human error, for all the little things we can do for them.
The Sea of life, let us hold hands in troubled times, and walk and cherish.
Netease's "the new pneumonia: Our War" feature tells the story of how we meet the epidemic every single day.

From the first case of COVID-19 pneumonia in Wuhan on December 8,2019, to the full outbreak on January 20,2020, the development of the situation is gripping everyone's heart.
It was a war that broke out at the beginning of the new year around every ordinary, ordinary Chinese.
This is our war, and we discuss it eagerly, analyze it carefully, deplore the loss of life in disaster, be moved by the audacity of the healer, and be Fear Is the Key by all human error, for all the little things we can do for them.
The Sea of life, let us hold hands in troubled times, and walk and cherish.
Netease's "the new pneumonia: Our War" feature tells the story of how we meet the epidemic every single day.

From the first case of COVID-19 pneumonia in Wuhan on December 8,2019, to the full outbreak on January 20,2020, the development of the situation is gripping everyone's heart.

It was a war that broke out at the beginning of the new year around every ordinary, ordinary Chinese.

This is our war, and we discuss it eagerly, analyze it carefully, deplore the loss of life in disaster, be moved by the audacity of the healer, and be Fear Is the Key by all human error, for all the little things we can do for them.

The Sea of life, let us hold hands in troubled times, and walk and cherish.

Netease's "the new pneumonia: Our War" feature tells the story of how we meet the epidemic every single day.

New Crown Pneumonia our war has been serialized 04

Closed teahouses, smashed Mahjong tables

My hometown is in a small village in the plain of western Sichuan, about 50 kilometers from Chengdu.
My Grandmother, who has three children, lives in the county seat, and her three grandchildren live further afield, in big cities like Beijing and Shanghai that are out of her reach. My grandmother used to say, "I gave birth to you and raised you, but you all grew up and flew away like birds. " On New Year's Eve, all three of US had to rush back to the countryside for the "Year of the regiments" , is What Grandma looks forward to all year round.
The day I returned to my grandmother's house, the epidemic had not yet aroused such great concern. The Winter Sun was lazily spreading on the earth. The fields were green. Several early-maturing rape plants were sprouting yellow flowers. Everything seemed calm and stable, spring is in the air.
GRANDMA'S YARD has a row of pomelo trees, the whole yard is the scent of trees, leaves, the wind blowing, the leaves of the green light flying fold, like a green water flashing in the surging. A few years ago, my grandmother raised a variety of animals, pigs, chickens, ducks, geese, these years to raise a little chicken to eat leftovers, there is a brown dog, named Lao Huang. Old Yellow Gentle, always silently looking at grandma, eyes like something to say, very loved. Mother said, I bought milk and cookies for her grandmother, her grandmother was reluctant to eat, but sometimes will be used to feed old yellow.
Third Aunt is sitting in the yard and grandmother Sun, together to clean leeks. The third aunt sighed and said that she thought the third uncle was dying, that is, the New Year these days. Suddenly, she remembered an important matter, tone hurried up: "eight teams of Ma Fung-kwok, you do not remember? The 10th day of the 1st Lunar Month, on the Ridge fell a fall, sent to the hospital and died. "
Like a pebble rippling across the yard, grandma was surprised. "really? " She said. "I saw him last month at the market. "
Third Aunt soon released: "people are old, like this, like porcelain bowl, one touch broken. But such a death is better than in bed sick for many years, do not drag down their children and grandchildren, also avoid suffering. "
GRANDMA SMILED: "If one day you go to bed, you will not think so, anyway, people still want to live. "
News of the pneumonia outbreak began to spread rapidly on the 22nd. Although Sichuan is some distance away from the center of the epidemic, the Spring Festival homecoming has already begun. Knowing that several of my friends working in Wuhan have returned to Sichuan, I immediately became nervous and advised my family to cancel the year of the Youth League this year. But the elders did not think so, that I "in the big city for a long time, see less strange, too pity life" , New Year's Eve morning, grandma in order to entertain their children and grandchildren, but also in the yard to kill a domesticated chicken.
On the first day of the Lunar New Year, I repeated the news about the epidemic in my family's wechat group. The elders still ignored it and clamored to get together to play Mahjong, especially my uncle.
When my uncle was young, he was a well-known gambler in the village. He was well-versed in all aspects of mah-jongg, fighting against landlords, frying gold flowers, running fast and playing long cards. In the past 10 years, my uncle and their gambling friends have left the countryside and moved to the county town to work and live. Playing Mahjong at home during the Spring Festival has become the main way for them to renew their friendship, more and "face" is closely related: Who can sit down leisurely in the village head Mahjong Hall, the greater the number of Mahjong, who will be able to prove that he now "live well. ". A group of middle aged men in their 40s and 50s, unskilled, generally engaged in hard work in the county seat -- as men delivered deliveries and decorated, as beautiful women, younger women sold clothes, after 45, you have to wait tables. They may usually live frugally, a dollar broken into two fifty cents, if the New Year in the face of old friends in the neighborhood, it is a rare happy time of the year.
My cousin was so angry that she came to me for advice. "My father had been itching to go out for a month, and now he wouldn't let him go out. He was as anxious as a monkey. I tried to tell him, and he said, after the 2008 Sichuan earthquake, the aftershocks, the mah-jongg we weren't afraid of back then, is it worse than an earthquake, i still remember, at that time, the villagers will stand on their heads next to the Mahjong table a beer bottle, as long as the bottle fell, they immediately ran out of the teahouse, vibration finished, then go back to play.
I co-cousin, cousin said, the elders are not serious. Finally, we had to put out a threat in the group that if they insisted on going out to play Mahjong, the three of US would move to a hotel in the county and not go home for the New Year next year.
The elders were so angry that they did not want to fight with me openly in the group. "Well, these three children of our family have read some books, and now they are bullying us. "
Unexpectedly, the next day, the atmosphere suddenly tense. The city government issued a notice: All teahouses, teahouses and other places where people gather are temporarily closed. It was from this moment that the people back home realized the seriousness of the problem. The elders thought it was incredible. After all, playing Mahjong in a teahouse has become their most familiar way of life and spiritual sustenance, the impact of closing a teahouse is more real than the agonies of our generation -- something is really wrong.
"Oh ho, not playing Mahjong is just like sitting in jail! " My uncle was still pretending to be happy in the group, but no one continued his joke, and everyone began to remind each other "don't move around each other, stay at home is the safest" , there was a faint sense of uneasiness in the crowd.
The government soon dispatched a group of on-duty police to patrol and search everywhere. They caught people who had gathered to play mah-jongg, rushed in directly and smashed the mah-jongg table with a hammer. Now everyone knew the government was serious. Everyone was shut down. There was hardly anyone on the road. Only the sparrows were still bouncing briskly from branch to branch and from wire to wire.
On January 28, the fourth day of the first lunar month, in the "real-time news of the new type of pneumonia epidemic in China" on the screen of the mobile phone, a series of "serious face" messages, such as the growing real-time epidemic situation, medical relief, and material donations, etc. , a "Sichuan Mahjong Hall all closed, " The news, to the people outside Sichuan, it seems a little funny, but to uncle, they may have no choice.

A Bewitched of reconciliation, a funeral you can't go to

Early on the morning of the 28th, my grandmother woke us up, and my grandfather's brother, my great uncle, had died, as was to be expected, not from pneumonia, but from terminal liver cancer.
The grandmother repeatedly sighs: "You say, this he Lao San, sooner or later not late, but die at this time. ". Now the people of the village are afraid to go out, no one gives him a ceremony, no one mourns, no one gives him a ride, just quietly, like the wind blowing on the grass, silently left."
Grandfather a total of five brothers, after the family split, but all live in a production team, each other door to door, chicken and dog smell. When I was young, the Five sisters-in-law got together and made a big deal out of every little thing, or isolated and defeated their opponents. Today you're with me, tomorrow I'll poke behind your back, is nothing less than love and hate in a palace drama.
Among them, my grandmother and third aunt is a pair of enemies.
According to her grandmother, the first time she saw her third aunt Zhang Xiuqiong, "I think this woman is not a good thing. ". Her eyes were long and thin, and her eyes were like those of a Fox, a cunning, scheming, fangy creature, whose white face, or as the old saying goes, "green face" , was evidence of a grudge and a small mind.
In their more than half a century of "diplomatic history" , bilateral relations have been at times treacherous, shifting and Away from Her. During the Ice Age, my grandmother used to accuse my grandmother of scheming, as if she were a young woman working in a factory, she also often took advantage of people not paying attention to hide in the pants leg, belt, secretly take home, this became her in the grandmother's heart can not erase the file; when the contradiction became white-hot, the grandmother had put the misdeeds of the third aunt, the third aunt was very angry, she poured manure on her grandmother, who affectionately called her "sister Joan" during the warm-up period, and praised her good-looking and quick-talking in front of others, she even sent her grandchildren home with a special treat.
In the country sky, white clouds and white dogs, there seems to be a subtle attraction between the two women, who can neither separate nor embrace, but always in a tension of opposites and unity. They sometimes moved, sometimes hate, sometimes confide in each other's difficulties, sometimes gnash their teeth, want to kill each other. Even their men couldn't fathom the extent to which their complex relationship had developed, as grandfather would often wake up, found that my grandmother's mouth kind and lovely "Joan sister" turned back into a shameless "Zhang sell x" .
This kind of situation, the liver cancer that year obtained the complete reversal finally in Uncle San. Grandma took her mother to the hospital to see, Sanshugong abdomen has become swollen swollen, as if the whole weight of the body is concentrated in the abdomen, Sanshugong eye socket deep, dark face, the whole person short circle. She took her grandmother's hand and said, "second sister, I have thought of giving him no treatment, he died, I also die, lest he suffer, also wasted children's money. " Grandmother scolded her: "A lifetime of clever, how come at this time so confused. ". Two old ladies burst into tears together, became a pair of dependent sisters.
We all advised grandma, the epidemic is serious, at this time do not go to uncle three, if you want to send condolences, we can transfer to uncle three's son on the mobile phone. Grandma Hung Up, sweep the yard, go to the kitchen to see if the water is hot, said, "so big, no one to make a decision for her" , "you all stay at home, I still have to see.
The morning fog had not yet lifted, and there was a white frost in the fields outside my house, and in the silence there was a great hint. Grandma wrapped her nose and mouth in a scarf and went out the door.
An hour later, grandma came back. Uncle Three family has decided, "do nothing" , as soon as possible to his crematorium, he lives in the county, the field of children and grandchildren also take into account the overall situation, temporarily do not go home, wait for the end of the epidemic, give him a make-up white wine banquet.
But the grandmother feels that does not have the meaning: "Wait until that time, he has already crossed the bridge, walked on the dead-end road for a long time, the human blow blows to beat him how to still hear? "

But the grandmother feels that does not have the meaning: "Wait until that time, he has already crossed the bridge, walked on the dead-end road for a long time, the human blow blows to beat him how to still hear? "

Grandmother in the fields, the unharvestable vegetables

She is 78 years old, and unlike her children and grandchildren, she and her grandfather have been reluctant to leave the countryside. Her mother had taken her several times to live in the county town, but she found the enclosed apartment stifling, and, mindful of the deserted fields and the family dog, always left without saying goodbye after two days.
Not only did she find it hard to live in a building, she and her 82-year-old grandfather still work in the fields. My grandmother worked as a farmer all her life, and she suffered from many chronic diseases. She often suffered from pain around her waist and shoulders. My grandfather had a car accident a few years ago, and his brain congestion damaged some of his motor functions. Now his left hand is not very handy, but that didn't stop them from going to the fields.
Their children and grandchildren repeatedly persuade them not to go to the ground again, so old still working, let a person uncomfortable, heartache, each family a little money, completely can let them live comfortably. Of course, my siblings and I were also a bit of a lock -- as if we let outsiders see our grandparents farming at their age, thinking that our children and grandchildren don't want to be filial and mistreating the elderly. But for her grandparents, "going to the ground" was not just a way of making a living, it was also an unstoppable habit of life, and it was linked to their simple moral values: those who did not work were immoral.
My Grandmother had never read a book in her life. She couldn't even write her own name, but she occasionally said something that made me feel inferior to myself when I was a literature major. For example, she said: a person's life is written in his name, Grandfather's name "Daita" , so he can not leave the field all his life, to old, unable to walk, one day died, will eventually return to the field. She also said: Children and grandchildren are birds, can fly, but she and her grandfather is turnip Tassel, out of the field, will not live a few days.
When news of the outbreak broke, I would grab my phone and check the news every few minutes. The statistics of growth, the latest reports from the front, the news from the group kept exploding in my mind, sadness, worry, fear, anger and other negative emotions are mixed, I like suffering from anxiety disorder like fidgeting, talking to my family is often absent-minded.
From beginning to end, only grandma and GRANDPA did not panic, they as usual, let inertia lead them to the field every day, work silently, do not say a word, living in a self-enclosed silence. We advised them not to go out, they said, an Mu of field, only two or three people, so empty place, how can it be infected.
This year, grandma planted more than two mu of vegetables. Children's Food I have only seen in Sichuan before, now with the development of logistics has begun to "north. ". This kind of green sprouts, like pagoda, thick roots, surrounded by each other holding a emerald green bags, like a mother holding a child, it is also known as "Baoercai. ". The dish is sweet and bitter in taste, and is used for stewing meat in winter to reduce heat. It is harvest season at present.
The government bans recreational activities in confined spaces and calls for people to travel less, but does not restrict farming. On the 29th, Grandma went to the field early in the morning to peel the baby vegetables and wait for the vegetable seller, Xiao Zhou, to buy them in the afternoon. I also went to the field to help, stripped for half an hour, waist will not straighten up acid. Sitting in the office, I can not imagine, grandmother has to work like this most of the day, she is how to persevere.
The Sky had darkened and there was no sign of Zhou. Grandma's eyes again and again toward the direction of the village road, could not help but dial a small week's phone.
"A cheekbone, wait a minute, don't worry. " Xiao Zhou's voice sounded like a loud trumpet, impatient and flustered, "I'm closing a lot of houses today. I'll come over later. The roads will be closed from tomorrow, so I can't get through, so I'll have to rush to collect all I can today. "
"How can the road be closed? " My grandmother was so shocked that she was only half-finished with the vegetables in her field. If the vegetable seller didn't come for several days, the vegetables would grow old after the mature period and become hollow and inedible.
"The government is tightening its grip, and some roads will be blocked tomorrow, " said Zhou, who was too busy with business to elaborate and hung up in a few words.
Grandma stood in the yard worried, the twilight becoming more and more blurred with her body.
"It's strange that the TV only said to seal off the sick place, but why do we have to seal it up even if it's far away from here? "
I can't explain it to grandma. Now that the local authorities are facing a major enemy, they do not dare to neglect the issue of epidemic prevention, and increase the number of steps one by one. Once they reach the grass-roots level, they will tend to adopt the most strict strategy of ensuring 100 percent that nothing will happen. As for whether it will delay the farmers'harvest, there are no more elaborate management policies. I can only comfort grandmother, "it does not matter, son dish total also can not sell how much money" , if I lose some money out to compensate her.
But these words did not have any effect, grandma's eyes sparkle: "No, every time I took your money, I feel guilty. " She began to repeat, last year because of the rain did not have time to collect, a lot of rotten in the ground, this had forgotten the dull pain, and now surfaced in her heart.
I have some concerns that farmers are the most vulnerable and silent group in any policy fluctuation, and they often suffer losses without the means to speak out. If the traffic is interrupted for too long, it will be a lose-lose situation for both farmers and urban residents.
I asked my friend who stayed in Beijing how she was doing. She said everyone around her was a little upset. She went to the supermarket during the day. Other supplies were fine, but it was hard to get fresh vegetables, "The box of horses by my house was sold out after half an hour's opening today. "
Even at night, Cho didn't come.

She is 78 years old, and unlike her children and grandchildren, she and her grandfather have been reluctant to leave the countryside. Her mother had taken her several times to live in the county town, but she found the enclosed apartment stifling, and, mindful of the deserted fields and the family dog, always left without saying goodbye after two days.

The Sky had darkened and there was no sign of Zhou. Grandma's eyes again and again toward the direction of the village road, could not help but dial a small week's phone.

"A cheekbone, wait a minute, don't worry. " Xiao Zhou's voice sounded like a loud trumpet, impatient and flustered, "I'm closing a lot of houses today. I'll come over later. The roads will be closed from tomorrow, so I can't get through, so I'll have to rush to collect all I can today. "

"How can the road be closed? " My grandmother was so shocked that she was only half-finished with the vegetables in her field. If the vegetable seller didn't come for several days, the vegetables would grow old after the mature period and become hollow and inedible.

"The government is tightening its grip, and some roads will be blocked tomorrow, " said Zhou, who was too busy with business to elaborate and hung up in a few words.

Grandma stood in the yard worried, the twilight becoming more and more blurred with her body.

"It's strange that the TV only said to seal off the sick place, but why do we have to seal it up even if it's far away from here? "

I can't explain it to grandma. Now that the local authorities are facing a major enemy, they do not dare to neglect the issue of epidemic prevention, and increase the number of steps one by one. Once they reach the grass-roots level, they will tend to adopt the most strict strategy of ensuring 100 percent that nothing will happen. As for whether it will delay the farmers'harvest, there are no more elaborate management policies. I can only comfort grandmother, "it does not matter, son dish total also can not sell how much money" , if I lose some money out to compensate her.

But these words did not have any effect, grandma's eyes sparkle: "No, every time I took your money, I feel guilty. " She began to repeat, last year because of the rain did not have time to collect, a lot of rotten in the ground, this had forgotten the dull pain, and now surfaced in her heart.

I have some concerns that farmers are the most vulnerable and silent group in any policy fluctuation, and they often suffer losses without the means to speak out. If the traffic is interrupted for too long, it will be a lose-lose situation for both farmers and urban residents.

I asked my friend who stayed in Beijing how she was doing. She said everyone around her was a little upset. She went to the supermarket during the day. Other supplies were fine, but it was hard to get fresh vegetables, "The box of horses by my house was sold out after half an hour's opening today. "

Even at night, Cho didn't come.

Never-ending chatter, dispelling persistent rumors

"Look, look, this is the new rural demonstration area built in Rio do Sul after the earthquake. There are family members there, and the son-in-law is back from working in Wuhan! His family has been lying to everyone, his son-in-law still running around, playing Mahjong! Until today he had a seizure and the production team rushed to his house and started fighting!"
In the family wechat group, my cousin suddenly retweeted a message and a shaky video. In the video, about 30 or 40 people gathered in front of a small building in the countryside. Some were wearing masks strictly, some were showing their faces and shouting abuse, and some were standing outside, craning their necks to watch the scene, others beat on the family's doors and windows with long sticks. The crowd surged, and the men in front of them, agitated, tried to break in and reason with the people inside. Two policemen stood guard at the door to prevent violence. The man and the policeman are almost cheek to cheek, and at this particular moment they seem to be breathing air into each other's faces. In the background, there was a buzzing noise, a few dirty words vaguely audible, perhaps condemning the family as "son of a bitch. ".
In the past year, Douyin has become the most fashionable means of communication in the country and in the countryside. Once people in a dull life open a window of entertainment within reach, they become obsessed with it. Mother sometimes also said, shaking sound brush long, people will feel tired and empty, the mind is full of colorful fragments, but nothing. I advised my mother to read something like Chiung Yao, or romance novel, or the Chicken Soup for the Soul, when she was younger. Mother shook her head again, "who still reads now, can't keep up with the trend" .
Within a few days, a short video of the outbreak went viral in my family. The elders from one extreme to the other extreme, a few days ago Dailie, do not care, these days is listening to the wind and rain, add oil and vinegar. The short video, which was forwarded by my cousin, quickly became the focus of discussion.
"Is it true? Although it is in Sichuan dialect, Sichuan is so big that it seems that the house is not ours. " My cousin raised a question in the group as if she were a Golden Fox, but no one answered her words, elders have begun to have a nose to describe the eye, "the People's Hospital yesterday has died a person, is likely to be the family's son-in-law. ".
I had to send a live feed of the outbreak to the crowd, let us not spread rumors: "This dynamic is the national network, updated quickly, if yesterday's death, should have been officially announced, now we have no deaths in the whole prefecture-level city. "
"The government just doesn't want us to know, " my aunt said confidently.
In addition, drinking can kill the virus, eat raw pepper can kill the virus, pets can be infected with the virus, a certain community in the urban area of a group of infectious... are also the elders of the rumors. At the beginning, my cousin and I, cousin like firefighters around the fire, found a rumor to put out a, said later, all feel a little powerless. Elders seem to be bored at home, deliberately and we play cat and mouse game, rumor growth is always faster than the speed of our refutation.
"I just found out today that all the elders in our family are Su Daqiang. " My cousin complained in the small group of the three of us, "Come on, let them believe it. It's okay to drink more wine and salt water. "
A few hours later, my cousin reposted on the group the official wechat account of the city government, which issued a statement refuting rumors of mass beating, making it clear that the video that my cousin had just forwarded was not a local matter. To convince everyone, the official microeditor has created a contrast image -- a screen shot on the left, the building is white, the new rural demonstration area in Rio do Sul is on the right, the building is Reddish Brown, the image is embossed in bold red letters: "obviously not in the same place. ".
Through the screen, I can feel the full desire to survive.
"Don't panic, elders, " I said. "It's hard to tell the truth from the truth. You should read the official news or the reports from the authoritative media. " I hastened to give my cousin a lecture, but no one answered me.
Then my cousin posted a funny video clip about the epidemic in the group, with the exaggerated tone and the funny music and the sound of laughter at the end.

"Look, look, this is the new rural demonstration area built in Rio do Sul after the earthquake. There are family members there, and the son-in-law is back from working in Wuhan! His family has been lying to everyone, his son-in-law still running around, playing Mahjong! Until today he had a seizure and the production team rushed to his house and started fighting!"

In the family wechat group, my cousin suddenly retweeted a message and a shaky video. In the video, about 30 or 40 people gathered in front of a small building in the countryside. Some were wearing masks strictly, some were showing their faces and shouting abuse, and some were standing outside, craning their necks to watch the scene, others beat on the family's doors and windows with long sticks. The crowd surged, and the men in front of them, agitated, tried to break in and reason with the people inside. Two policemen stood guard at the door to prevent violence. The man and the policeman are almost cheek to cheek, and at this particular moment they seem to be breathing air into each other's faces. In the background, there was a buzzing noise, a few dirty words vaguely audible, perhaps condemning the family as "son of a bitch. ".

Mother shook her head again, "who still reads now, can't keep up with the trend" .

".

A few hours later, my cousin reposted on the group the official wechat account of the city government, which issued a statement refuting rumors of mass beating, making it clear that the video that my cousin had just forwarded was not a local matter. To convince everyone, the official microeditor has created a contrast image -- a screen shot on the left, the building is white, the new rural demonstration area in Rio do Sul is on the right, the building is Reddish Brown, the image is embossed in bold red letters: "obviously not in the same place. ".

Through the screen, I can feel the full desire to survive.

"Don't panic, elders, " I said. "It's hard to tell the truth from the truth. You should read the official news or the reports from the authoritative media. " I hastened to give my cousin a lecture, but no one answered me.

Then my cousin posted a funny video clip about the epidemic in the group, with the exaggerated tone and the funny music and the sound of laughter at the end.

Eager to return to the city of the younger generation, the old people resettled

Early on the morning of the 30th, Zhou finally arrived with his tricycle full of dust and black marks on his mask.
"On the cheekbones, it's $1.40 a kilo today. "
"yesterday, it was $1.60. How come there are still two dimes missing today? You people, don't try to deceive us, old people. " Grandma said angrily.
Xiao Zhou shouted at the top of her voice, "I didn't cheat you, " he said. "Now people are in a panic. I don't know if I can sell it again. My superiors are also lowering the price. I'm also angry. " "Why don't you go and see if anyone else will take it? I'm the only one in the area who's still taking it. Make up your mind. I have to get my car out of the village by 9 o'clock. I'm afraid I won't be able to get out later. "
Grandma waved her hand and said, "$1.40 it is. ".
When the dishes were weighed, my mother heard that some roads had been blocked by Xiao Zhou. She felt a little flustered and worried that the road back to the county town would be impassable in the next two days. We decided to go back to the city immediately, I am more worried about the change, want to return to Beijing as soon as possible.
Grandma had not recovered from the shock of Zhou's price reduction, and when she heard that we were leaving, she looked at her mother with even more sadness. "Are you leaving now? " She took my hand again and said, "I won't see my granddaughter until next year. "
My mother's generation, the early years of life in the town, near the countryside, grandma go to market, walk can also go to town to see their children and grandchildren. It was the golden age of the village, when the market was crowded. Mother opened a wine shop in the town, their own sorghum wine, home production and sales, business is prosperous, father in the town middle school teaching, my family's life is quite moist. Later, "fewer and fewer people, the young people are going to the city, the people who stay, think to drink a brand of bottled wine to have noodles, business is getting worse and worse, sometimes half a day only to wait for a patron. ". Mother simply closed the liquor store, to the county to find another sales job, father's school was also too few students were merged, the work was transferred to the county near the city, we will buy a house in the county life.
There are no big words like "urbanization" or "aging" in a mother's mind, only the fragmentary images of real-life collisions and the dizziness and pain of rapid change around her. The pain was subtle, sometimes imperceptible, sometimes forgotten by her mother, sometimes sudden, in the dead of night when she could not sleep. She couldn't help but tell me over and over that the school where we used to live was now overgrown and deserted, that the shutters of her old wine shop were shuttered and dusty, and that there were hardly any young people in the countryside, all that was left was the old man who had moved on.
To my mother's great sorrow, one by one, these old people were taken away by incurable diseases. My grandfather's brothers died of stomach cancer, esophageal cancer, cerebral hemorrhage, and liver cancer, both as carriers of disease and as metaphors for it -- as if the Zang-fu were dying off. I comforted my mother: As life expectancy has increased, cancer has increased as a normal phenomenon, but also related to the lifestyle of older generations. My Mother did not believe me at all. She was enveloped in a kind of great grief, preferring to believe the fortune-teller's statement that so many people in the village were ill because of the poor pulse of the land, and that the place where the village lived was under the tail of a dragon who could not move, fIDGETY, so often bring disaster. The only way to do that is to move out as a group and build a new home.
But it is not easy for dozens of families to move collectively. Families with a little bit of means simply give up their home in order to live better and get rid of the shadow of superstition. They would rather rent a house than stay in the county seat. The pace of migration has been accelerated by the post-earthquake reconstruction in Wenchuan County, where the Glamour of the city is unquestionably greater and the countryside is inevitably Pale and silent.
Uncle died the second day, to the crematorium funeral car finally found, the past to a trip, two or three hundred dollars can be. Now special period, the driver is not willing to go out, at any rate, finally increased to 500 yuan, the driver would like to run a trip.
The car rumbled away, "He Lao San has been so stingy all his life that his own grandson can't afford to buy a candy Bar, " said his grandmother suddenly black comedy. "If he knew that he paid twice as much to go to the crematorium, he would have to tell his sister June to burn it at home. "
Finally, the grandmother also worried about the dishes in the field, carrying the basket on his back to the ground.
I followed her, the empty basket creaking on her shoulder as if singing briskly. The panic in my heart faded away, and there was a wonderful wonder: She did not seem to be sad about the death of her uncle, and she was not afraid of the epidemic outside, as if she did not think that human life was worth more than the acres of food in front of her. But I know my grandmother is not a cold-hearted person, who is in trouble in the village, she is willing to help, this in the end how to explain?
When I was a child, whenever I mentioned the word "death" , my grandmother was in a state of shock and was in a hurry to "fie" , lest I should get my hands on something inauspicious. However, around the time of my return to Tuannian, my grandmother even talked about death so calmly from time to time, it's like talking about eating or going to the ground. I'm still a little confused by the emotion.
Before my mother and I returned to the city, my grandmother hurriedly packed me three catties of vegetables, two bags of pickled turnips, and a jar of Spicy fermented bean curd. She blushed. "You gave grandma a red envelope, but grandma didn't have anything nice to give you. "
Grandma is haunted by the shame of not being able to give her children and grandchildren a better life. She doesn't know, and I'm ashamed. I'm a traitor who ran away from the land that gave me birth. Sitting in the car on my way back to the county seat, with my grandmother's vegetables, dried turnips and fermented bean curd in my arms, I felt safe and unafraid, even though I was about to return to Beijing and face the unknown in that huge, chaotic city.
Outside the window, the ground had been torn by the earthquake, but now the wound had healed. Catastrophe always happens, in the face of disaster, people are always easy to be collectivism, large, stress emotions, but disaster will always have a time in the past, and life is long, specific, subtle. Perhaps the more we love concrete things on earth, the more courage we have in the face of disaster.

Early on the morning of the 30th, Zhou finally arrived with his tricycle full of dust and black marks on his mask.
